title: Top Places to visit in Piler, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Pileru is a census town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the mandal headquarters of Pileru mandal in Madanapalle revenue division  It passes through a river and hence it got the name Pileru. In the local language, Pilla Eru literally translates to A small water stream.

 

Education

The primary and secondary school education is imparted by government, aided and private schools, under the School Education Department of the state. The medium of instruction followed by different schools is English, Telugu, and Urdu. primary schools list m.p.p school, Lakshmi Puram m.p.u.p school old bus stand Sri Chaitanya techno school, Yarram reddy gutta Narayana schools, ajantha mitta v.s.n Siddhartha school, Tirupati road sri kakathiya schools, piler

 

list of junior colleges govt junior college, piler govt women's junior college, piler margadarsi junior college Priyadarshini junior college Sri Medha junior college Sri Chaitanya junior college Sri Bharathi junior college

 

degree colleges c.n.r arts and science college, piler Sri Bharathi degree college, piler Sri Chaitanya women's degree college, piler s.g govt degree college, piler

 

Transport

Pileru is located on the junction point of National Highway 40 (India), halfway between Rayachoty and Chittoor and National Highway 71 (India), halfway between Tirupati and Madanapalle. Pileru railway station is situated on Dharmavarm - Pakala Branch line. Daily train services are available to Tirupati, Guntakal, and Hyderabad.

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pileru

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Vinukonda, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content:
Vinukonda is a town in the Guntur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the headquarters of Vinukonda Mandal and administered under the Narasaraopet revenue division.
 
Etymology

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Srikalahasti, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Srikalahasti is a holy town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the Mandal headquarters of Srikalahasti Mandal in the Tirupati revenue division. recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in West Godavari, Eluru, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: West Godavari district or Paschima Godavari Jilla is one of the 13 districts in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
recommendations.content: Anantapur (officially:Anantapuramu) is a city in Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the mandal headquarters of Anantapuramu mandal and also the divisional headquarters of Anantapur revenue division. The city is located on National Highway. It was also the headquarters
